Name: srvid
Description: The OID of the foreign server that contains this\n mapping

Name: umuser
Description: OID of the local role being mapped, 0 if the user\n mapping is public

Name: usename
Description: Name of the local user to be mapped

Name: umoptions
Description: User mapping specific options, as "keyword=value" strings, if the current\n user is the owner of the foreign server, else null.
